turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was looking to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking a Caffè Americano with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what size would you like it in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, just to let you know, this drink doesn't typically come with milk but if you'd like you can still add it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, and which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one that's in Fort Gratiot, Michigan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me send your order to that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a grande caffe americano with whole milk to be picked up at the starbucks in fort gratiot, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you. That'll be it.
